features.name: party-createdate
features.description: Date for party type creation (data for change of the state)

features.name: party-year
features.description: Date of establishment (birthday) of the party (value in year)

features.name: party-state
features.description: Party state (e.g. prospect, lead, active-client, etc.)

features.name: party-industry
features.description: Party industry (e.g. IT, Medical, Finance, etc.)

features.name: party-industryposition
features.description: Party position in industry (e.g. IT-developer, IT-admin, Finance-Accountant, etc.)

features.name: party-incomehousehold
features.description: Monthly income in local currency for household

features.name: party-expenseshousehold
features.description: Monthly expenses (insurence, loans, etc.) for household

features.name: record-date
features.description: The date when the record was created
